alldb.table_sql: SELECT BM.ID AS ID, BMT.ID AS BID, PI.PROJECT_NAME AS PROJECTNAME, BM.MSG_TITLE AS MSGTITLE, BM.SEND_DATE AS SENDDATE, (CASE BMT.READ_STATUS WHEN '1' THEN '未读' WHEN '0' THEN '已读' ELSE ' ' END) AS READSTATUS, TU.REALNAME_ REALNAME FROM BASE_MESSAGE_TO_USER BMT LEFT JOIN BASE_MESSAGE BM ON BM.ID = BMT.MSG_ID LEFT JOIN T_USERS TU ON TU.ID_ = BM.FROMUSER left join proj_info pi on pi.id=BM.proj_id WHERE 1=1 AND BMT.READ_USER = '{USER_ID}' /~MSG_TYPE: AND BM.MSG_TYPE = '{MSG_TYPE}'~/ <EXTRACTEND> order by READSTATUS DESC,SENDDATE DESC<EXTRACTEND>
